headline: Jim Cramer Discusses Elliot Management’s Stake in PepsiCo
summary: PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP) is one of the stocks that Jim Cramer put under a microscope. Discussing Elliott Management’s stake in the stock during the episode, Cramer said: “If you study Elliott, as I have, you recognize that these guys aren’t gunslingers and they aren’t pirates. headline: Zacks Industry Outlook Highlights Coca-Cola, PepsiCo, Monster Beverage, Keurig Dr Pepper and Zevia
summary: Soft drink makers like Coca-Cola, PepsiCo, Monster, Keurig Dr Pepper, and Zevia are battling rising costs and tariffs while chasing growth through health-focused innovation and digital expansion.
